stim_intensity.helpTip: Intensity of the stimuli in mA (this is set on external device. Recorded here for reporting)

number_of_trials.helpTip: A trial consists of stimulation (Trigger and Audio PreStim) and inter/intra trial periods

audio_prestim.helpTip: Whether or not to play audio prior to stimulation

dual_stim.helpTip: Whether or not to stimulate twice

inter_stim_period.helpTip: If dual stimuli, this parameters determines how long in-between stimulations in seconds

inter_trial_period.helpTip: Time in seconds between each trial

intra_trial_period.helpTip: Time in seconds between each trial and audio pre-stimulation

number_of_blocks.helpTip: Number of stimulation blocks. A block consists of a trials and a rest period.

rest_period.helpTip: Rest period in seconds between stimulation blocks
